title: My Man Lies Like A Rug
itunes:title: My Man Lies Like A Rug
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my child’s father is a habitual liar. We’ve been dating for three years and he has lied to me about the most stupid stuff. We have almost been evicted because he lied about paying our rent. After I had our son, he told me he bought a ring and was going to propose, but he got in a financial bind and had to return the ring to pay off some debt. He has taken money out of our son’s bank account for petty things that he needs and then he lies about it and says it was for bank fees or something else..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my child’s father is a habitual liar. We’ve been dating for three years and he has lied to me about the most stupid stuff. We have almost been evicted because he lied about paying our rent. After I had our son, he told me he bought a ring and was going to propose, but he got in a financial bind and had to return the ring to pay off some debt. He has taken money out of our son’s bank account for petty things that he needs and then he lies about it and says it was for bank fees or something else..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
